snippet.title: Bass Defense Demo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Bass Defense is a rhythm-based tower defense game coming soon to Steam, you can wishlist now and subscribe to get news about the demo release!

Two genres clash together in a rhythm-based gaming experience. Bass Defense is one of the world's first rhythm-based tower defense games. You fight against waves of NMYs who try to destroy your base, unless you save it with the help of your upgradable power-ups or the force in your sense of rhythm.

NMYs don't like you.
NMYs want to destroy you.
NMYs attack you in forms of soundwaves.
NMYs are everywhere.
NMYs are part of the music.
NMYs are part of the rhythm.
NMYs are part of YOU.

Can you stay focused?
Can you destroy them all?
Can you save the base, with the help of ... BASS?
